mapper.insert: insert into t_payment_item(id, item_name, reimbursement_cap, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, description) values ( #{id}, #{itemName}, #{reimbursementCap}, now(), #{createUser}, now(), #{createUser}, #{description} )
mapper.update: update t_payment_item set item_name = #{itemName}, reimbursement_cap = #{reimbursementCap}, update_time = now(), update_user = #{updateUser}, description = #{description}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id as id, item_name as itemName, reimbursement_cap as reimbursementCap, create_time as createTime, create_user as createUser, update_time as updateTime, update_user as updateUser, description as description, version as version from t_payment_item where id = #{id}
